surface_layer.definition: A technique that simultaneously builds a map of the environment and localizes the sensor within it using visual data.

deep_layer.mechanism: Uses camera input to estimate the sensor's position and orientation while concurrently constructing a 3D representation of the surroundings.
deep_layer.origin: Developed in the field of robotics and computer vision.

epistemic_metadata.source: Review A survey of state-of-the-art on visual SLAM - ScienceDirect.com
